籤詩版本二:
Qin Jun ya jure rayuwa mai ra'ayin mazan jiya kuma ya ƙudurta ba zai aikata mugunta ba.
Har sai wani ya yi karfi a hankali, rassan da suka mutu da tsofaffin bishiyoyi za su sake farfado da furanni.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana kama da matattun furanni masu girma na itace.
Komai yana da nasa nasarar.
解曰: Ku kasance masu ra'ayin mazan jiya da shiru. Abubuwa sun zo gaskiya. Idan ya motsa, za a yi bala'i da yawa. Shiru babu laifi.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Kamun kifi na Weishui
A daular Zhou, an haifi Jiang Shang, mai suna Ziya a Ji (dan asalin Xuzhou, dake gabashin tekun China), kuma sunansa na Taoist Fei Xiong. An ba kakan sunan Zai Lu (sunan wuri), don haka ana kiransa Lu Wang.
Domin gujewa matsalolin zamanin sarki Zhou na daular Shang, Jiang Ziya ta zauna kusa da ruwan tekun gabashin kasar Sin, tana kuma yin kamun kifi a kogin Weishui.
Kifin kifi ya mike, a gaskiya zuciyarsa ba ta kamun kifi ba, amma burinsa shine ya zama firayim minista.
Sarki Wen ya ji cewa yana da hikima sai ya dauke shi malaminsa (Firayim Minista). (Jiang Ziya yana da shekaru tamanin a lokacin)
Bayan haka, Sarkin Wu na Zhou ya kai hari ga sarki Zhou na Shang, ya lalata daular Shang, ya kafa daular Zhou. Sarki Wu ya kira Jiang Ziya Shangfu. Dan Feng Jiang, Ding Gong, ya zama Marquis na Qi.
(Wannan labari misali ne: jira dama, jira har sai an sami dama mai jawo, sannan za a fara ci gaba).
聖意: Sa'a ga iyali, gida, arziki, idan lokaci ya yi za a sami nasara, idan aka haifi yarinya a Liujia, masu tafiya za su toshe gonaki, a toshe tsummoki na siliki, dabbobi shida zasu yi wuya a samu, kyau. sa'a a shari'a, hijira, ra'ayin mazan jiya, asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya da albarka.
